alert.note: Alert for Blount (Tennessee) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Flood Advisory issued January 09 at 10:07AM CST by NWS Knoxville
info.description: ...FLOOD ADVISORY IN EFFECT UNTIL 4 PM EST THIS AFTERNOON... * WHAT...Flooding caused by excessive rainfall is expected. * WHERE...A portion of east Tennessee, including the following counties, Blount and Sevier. * WHEN...Until 400 PM EST. * IMPACTS...Minor flooding in low-lying and poor drainage areas. River or stream flows are elevated in the mountains, and these flows will proceed downstream through the day. The West Prong Little Pigeon River is among these as it flows through Pigeon Forge and Sevierville. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 1104 AM EST, gauge reports indicated stream rises. Minor flooding is ongoing or expected to begin shortly in the advisory area. - Some locations that may experience flooding include... Sevierville, Gatlinburg, Pigeon Forge, Pittman Center, Townsend, McMahan, Wears Valley, Roundtop Mountain State Park, Seymour, Kodak, Harrisburg, Walland and Great Smoky Mountains National Park. - http://www.weather.gov/safety/flood
info.instruction: Turn around, don`t drown when encountering flooded roads. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles.
